p: Functional groups of the pure cinnamon oil, stearic acid, Labrafac, Tween 80, and the optimized formulation were analyzed in the range of 4000–450 cm −1 by Cary 630 FTIR Spectrometer (Agilent, Santa Clara, CA), set on 74 scans at 4 cm −1 for each spectrum. All samples were analyzed with their original forms without further treatment.
